org.apache.nutch.indexer

Class FsDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.store.Directory

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class FsDirectory
extends org.apache.lucene.store.Directory
    Reads a Lucene index stored in DFS.
